alert.note: Alert for Northern Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 19 at 2:52PM MST until February 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Blowing and drifting snow. Cold Wind Chills. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Phillips County. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 15 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
